decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (T3, design and access statement, untitled (Elevation drawing), block plan, location plan and site plan received on 28/05/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - Prior to commencement of the proposed development, the existing BT phone box in Bell Square shall be removed.
description: Installation of a public telephone/ATM booth
